body:
Ah so those two became a crazy swingers too in the end.
Lol, i really want to see their (mc and maso) parent face when that girl gave birth to a baby that looks like the asshat guy, while of course that blond gave birth to a baby that looks like mc.
But i doubt this guy would turn the plot like that.

I mean if you think about it, my man it's the one winning so far in the long run. If he plays he's cards right (which he probably won't... but still) Remember that FML comes from a rich family and they expect to leave their business in the hands of MC. So he is marrying rich, plus is not like he is just getting cucked in the sideline, he's got a girl that is really into him appreciates him and prefers him over his boyfriend. Other than having a wife that is secretly a maso that lust for another man is not a big price to pay really
God I hope he ends up with the blonde chick

They literally came from church signing papers for marrige, she lovey dovey on his arms, the moment his friend flip her switch she went hoe mode. He look like he was not expecting any of this, he needs to take his friends girl and break away from this swinging bs cause his girl is in too deep
